text: Zisas mbaram kama havharan ana goriruav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu shɨshɨgɨp kha bigeŋ bun harigi guma the suaŋ thari. Ndu ŋgɨp wo fhavan Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guma khɨvari. Ndu ana khɨvav, mbaram won rɨmrɨm vhɨzgiap fhav ŋgarigi ne suaŋv, Fhe Bakɨme suaŋv, mba Moses fhum suaŋgi shaman muuŋri. Ndu mba shaman muuŋrim, mbe gangip kaŋgirga, ndu rɨmrɨm vhɨzgi.”
